record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - April 03, 2008)

[Page: H1979]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days within which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on the bill, H.R. 4847, as amended.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Arizona?
